PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Explore a sprawling, dystopian cityscape where high-tech meets low-life in a world of corporate intrigue and street-level survival.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Upgrade your body with cutting-edge cybernetic enhancements, blurring the line between human and machine in your quest for power.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Navigate the digital underbelly of the city, infiltrating corporate networks and manipulating the very fabric of society to your advantage.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Immerse yourself in a sprawling, vertically-stacked city where neon lights pierce through the smog and danger lurks around every corner.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Navigate the urban jungle with cutting-edge AR tech, accessing real-time data and hacking opportunities at the blink of an eye.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Upgrade your body with state-of-the-art implants and enhancements, pushing the boundaries between human and machine.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Dive into a world where megacorporations rule and loyalty is bought. Choose your allegiances wisely as you climb the power ladder.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Jack into the matrix and execute high-stakes hacking operations, battling AI security systems and rival netrunners in cyberspace.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Experience a gripping story of rebellion, survival, and identity in a world where technology has both elevated and corrupted humanity.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Neon Dreams: Your Burning Questions Answered
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What makes Neon Dreams different from other cyberpunk games?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Neon Dreams sets itself apart with its dynamic, ever-evolving cityscape, deep character customization including cybernetic enhancements, and a branching narrative that truly reacts to your choices. Every decision you make shapes the neon-lit underworld around you.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I play Neon Dreams offline?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: While Neon Dreams is designed as an immersive online experience, we do offer an offline mode with limited features. However, to fully experience the dynamic world and multiplayer elements, an internet connection is recommended.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What are the system requirements for Neon Dreams?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Neon Dreams pushes the boundaries of graphics and AI. For the best experience, we recommend a high-end gaming PC or next-gen console. Detailed system requirements can be found on our official website, including options for cloud gaming.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is there a multiplayer mode in Neon Dreams?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! Neon Dreams features both a rich single-player campaign and an expansive multiplayer mode. Team up with friends for co-op missions, engage in cyber-enhanced PvP battles, or simply explore the bustling nightlife of our cyberpunk metropolis together.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Hack, Fight, and Survive in a Corporate-Controlled Future
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Enter the neon-soaked streets of tomorrow
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Jack In to Our Neon-Lit Updates
CTA_BODY: Dive into a gritty, high-tech world where cyber-enhanced humans fight for survival in a corporate-controlled dystopia. Hack, shoot, and augment your way through neon-lit streets and towering megastructures.
CTA_SUBTITLE: Embrace the Chrome, Defy the System
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Cybernetic Upgrades. Ruthless Corporations. Endless Possibilities.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Direct neural link for faster data processing
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Enhanced vision with zoom and night capabilities
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Reinforced skin for improved damage resistance
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Concealed firearm integrated into the forearm
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: High-end hacking device for breaching security
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Unlock the secrets of the cyberpunk underground
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What's the recommended hardware for optimal gameplay?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: For the full immersive experience, we recommend a high-end GPU, at least 16GB RAM, and a neural-link compatible VR headset. But don't worry, street samurai - the game is optimized to run on most rigs from the last 5 years.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I customize my character's cybernetic enhancements?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Absolutely! Our state-of-the-art character customization allows you to trick out your avatar with the latest in black market cyberware. From ocular implants to dermal armor, the choice is yours. Just remember, every enhancement comes with a price...
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You bet your last credit chip there is! Team up with other runners for high-stakes heists, or go head-to-head in our neon-drenched PvP arenas. The streets are waiting, and they're hungry for action.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often will new content be released?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We're jacked in and constantly uploading. Expect monthly patches with bug fixes and balance tweaks, and major content drops every quarter. New missions, gear, and even entire districts of the city are in the pipeline. Stay frosty, choombas.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there an in-game economy or trading system?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Welcome to the black market, samurai. Our robust in-game economy lets you wheel and deal in everything from black ICE to military-grade chrome. Trade with NPCs or other players, but watch your back - in Night City, a deal can turn deadly in a heartbeat.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Hack, fight, and survive in a world where technology rules and corporations dominate
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Enter the dystopian future - Pre-order now and get exclusive in-game items!
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Hack the System, Own the Streets
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Immerse yourself in a neon-drenched metropolis where technology rules and danger lurks around every corner. Customize your cyborg avatar, master futuristic weapons, and navigate a world of corporate intrigue and street-level warfare.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Hack, fight, and survive in a dystopian metropolis where corporations rule and augmented reality blurs the line between human and machine.
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear what the denizens of our dystopian world have to say
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This game is a mind-blowing dive into a gritty, neon-soaked future. The attention to detail in the cybernetic upgrades and corporate conspiracies had me hooked from the start!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The immersive cityscape and intricate storylines make this cyberpunk world feel alive. I've never felt so connected to a digital reality. It's dangerously addictive!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: From the pulsing synthwave soundtrack to the morally ambiguous choices, this game captures the essence of cyberpunk perfectly. It's a thrilling ride through a high-tech, low-life future.
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Ready to hack the system? We need your skills, Runner.
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Which megacorp are you affiliated with?
Tell us about your most daring hack
